BattleShip.Ship

      Subclasses of Ship in BattleShip 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BattleShip
      Battle ship: where length is 4, width is 1 Load the picture of vertical and horizontal
      class  Carrier
      Carrier: where length is 5, width is 1 Load the picture of vertical and horizontal
      class  Cruiser

      class  Destroyer

      Methods in BattleShip that return Ship 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Ship DataParser.decodeShip(java.lang.String shipInfo)
      Decode the ship and create a clone ship by information provided encoded as "Destroy, " + type + ", " + row + ", " + col + ", " + dir;

      Getter: get the ship at an index
